title: "Final Graphics (for now)"
output: html_notebook

```{r loading the libraries and data}
library(tidyverse)
library(fpp3)
library(dplyr)
home_price_data <- read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/flynnecon/forecasting-2026/refs/heads/main/data/us_house_prices.csv")
```

```{r setting up tsibble}
homeprice_ts <- home_price_data |> mutate(date=yearmonth(observation_date)) |> select(-observation_date) |> as_tsibble(index=date)
```

```{r subseason plot}
homeprice_ts |> gg_subseries(csus_nsa)
```

```{r lagplot}
homeprice_ts |> gg_lag(csus_nsa, geom="point")
```
